chart.title: Greenhouse gas emissions by sector
chart.subtitle: [Greenhouse gas emissions](#dod:ghgemissions) are measured in tonnes of [carbon dioxide-equivalents](#dod:carbondioxideequivalents) over a 100-year timescale.
chart.note: Land-use change emissions can be negative.
